body_html:
Hi @rundembear and @venuswu,

Sorry for the late reply, I missed the updates here. Would you please try device_lib.list_local_devices(session_config=config) where config is the ConfigProto that is used later to create your session? This can make sure the same config is used within the process.

Let me know if there are any other questions. Thanks.
body_text:
Hi @rundembear and @venuswu,
Sorry for the late reply, I missed the updates here. Would you please try device_lib.list_local_devices(session_config=config) where config is the ConfigProto that is used later to create your session? This can make sure the same config is used within the process.
Let me know if there are any other questions. Thanks.
body:
Hi @rundembear and @venuswu,

Sorry for the late reply, I missed the updates here. Would you please try `device_lib.list_local_devices(session_config=config)` where `config` is the `ConfigProto` that is used later to create your session? This can make sure the same config is used within the process.

Let me know if there are any other questions. Thanks.
